alert.note: Alert for Chatham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 22 at 8:29PM EST until January 22 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EST FOR PORTIONS OF CHATHAM...BEAUFORT AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 828 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Whitemarsh Island, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Hilton Head Island, Bluffton, Tybee Island, Wilmington Island, Hutchinson Island, Downtown Savannah, Montgomery, Thunderbolt, Sandfly, Isle Of Hope, Whitemarsh Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
